OOC: Great to see you again Yanshosh. Is the energy draining any of my
characters?


Sinnertwin looks through all the chaos, and fires two armor piercing
grenades at the CF, but two grenades rock the area he is standing in, and
send him flying into the smoke. He transforms, and starts to light his
vision with his flame breath, seeing who shot at him. "Grrrrr, you die" one
head yelled, now that he was in his two headed lizard mode. "Yess, we rip
you, we rend you, we naw on your cerebro circuits," the other said, as it
started salivating.


"*Snort snrllll, it is time to start fighting" replies Headstrong, as he
transforms into his Rhino mode, and charges towards Flare, hoping to impale
him with his acid releasing horn.

Tantrum takes to the air, and begins to shoot electric blasts out of his
horns, and steadies his gun, and fires two laser blasts, all at Slasys.
